content: here s pochita amigurumi from the anime series chainsaw man he looks like a pug but there s something quite different about him he has a chainsaw right above his snout so be careful when petting otherwise he s quite a loyal buddy and will even bond to your heart his notable features includes of course his saw a handle around his body a tail with a triangle tip and another handle on his behind this free crochet pattern for pochita will help you create all his fun features the handle is created in a unique way using both crochet and a pipe cleaner **************** **approximate size ** 8in wide by 5in tall 20cm wide by 13cm tall i d love to see how your pochita turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 1 you can also crochet along with me on my pochita video tutorial 2 on my youtube channel ****************** **level ** easy intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet half_double_crochet increase decrease slip_stitch chain color change 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //youtu be/zhihiw4uyly
